******************************************************************************* Copyright Since 2005 ColdBox Framework by Luis Majano and Ortus Solutions, Corp www.coldbox.org | www.luismajano.com | www.ortussolutions.com ******************************************************************************* This validator validates if a field is the same as another field with case sensitivity
